Skills.Name: Guard Up!
Skills.Description: Raises own DEF by <color=red>{0}%</color> for 10s. Shields DMG (<color=red>{0}%</color> of Skill user's ATK) of Blue Elemental allies (behind self) for 15s.
Skills.ShortDescription: Raises own DEF. Shields DMG of Blue Elemental allies behind self

Skills.Name: 4-point Strike
Skills.Description: Inflicts 4-hit DMG (<color=red>{0}%</color> + <color=red>{1}%</color> + <color=red>{2}%</color> + <color=red>{3}%</color>) on single enemy. Further grants "Mystic Power" for 25s.
Skills.ShortDescription: Inflicts 4-hit DMG, grants "Mystic Power" on single enemy

Skills.Name: My Dream Combo!
Skills.Description: Inflicts <color=red>{0}%</color> DMG on all enemies. Further inflicts Stun for 1s per 3x "Mystic Power" (Max. 7s). Raises own DEF by <color=red>{2}%</color> for 10s. Further recovers HP by <color=red>{3}%</color> of ATK.
Skills.ShortDescription: Inflicts DMG on all enemies, inflicts Stun based on its total "Mystic Power". Raises own DEF, recovers HP

Skills.Name: Strike Combo
Skills.Description: Reduces DMG Received for all allies by <color=red>5.00%-40.00%</color> for 5s according to Combo Bonus. Inflicts 100.00% DMG.
Skills.ShortDescription: Reduces DMG Received for all allies, inflicts DMG on single enemy

Skills.Name: School Rocks!
Skills.Description: Each time DMG is received, lowers ATK of single random enemy by <color=red>{0}%</color> for 5s (CT 4s). Further grants "Mystic Power" on single random enemy for 25s. (CT 4s)
Skills.ShortDescription: Each time DMG is received, lowers 1x random foe's ATK. Grants "Mystic Power" randomly

Skills.Name: Guard Up! +
Skills.Description: Raises own DEF by <color=red>{0}%</color> for 10s. Shields DMG (<color=red>{0}%</color> of Skill user's ATK) of Blue Elemental allies (behind self) for 15s.
Skills.ShortDescription: Raises own DEF. Shields DMG of Blue Elemental allies behind self

Skills.Name: 4-point Strike +
Skills.Description: Inflicts 4-hit DMG (<color=red>{0}%</color> + <color=red>{1}%</color> + <color=red>{2}%</color> + <color=red>{3}%</color>) on single enemy. Also inflicts Stun for 3s. Further grants 2x "Mystic Power" for 25s.
Skills.ShortDescription: Inflicts 4-hit DMG, Stun and grants "Mystic Power" on single enemy

Skills.Name: My Dream Combo! +
Skills.Description: Inflicts <color=red>{0}%</color> DMG on all enemies. Further inflicts Stun for 1s per 2x "Mystic Power" (Max. 7s). Raises own DEF by <color=red>{2}%</color> for 10s. Further recovers HP by <color=red>{3}%</color> of ATK.
Skills.ShortDescription: Inflicts DMG on all enemies, inflicts Stun based on its total "Mystic Power". Raises own DEF, recovers HP

Skills.Name: School Rocks! +
Skills.Description: Each time DMG is received, lowers ATK of single random enemy by <color=red>{0}%</color> for 5s (CT 2s). Further grants "Mystic Power" on single random enemy for 25s. (CT 2s)
Skills.ShortDescription: Each time DMG is received, lowers 1x random foe's ATK. Grants "Mystic Power" randomly

Skills.Name: School Rocks!: Zeta Only
Skills.Description: At start of Wave, reduces own DMG Received by <color=red>{0}%</color> for 20s

At start of Wave, reduces
own DMG Received
